movie-description: A nerdish computer-type stumbles upon a virtual computer program that puts the viewer right into the experience. His roommate convinces him to use it as a sex-type program and sell folks various sexual "experiences." Meanwhile, the nerd aspires to date a girl he's too shy to approach, and hopes the virtual encounter program will help him out.
movie-short-description: Directed by Cybil Richards.  With Ethan Hunt, John Roberts, Brandy Davis, Jill Tompkins. Two college guys sell "virtual sex" out of their dorm room.
